title: How else can I contact support?
body:
I had a bad connection issue between 2 and 3 weeks ago during a game with my latency upwards of 2000ms. I got disconnected and gave up for the afternoon hoping whatever the issue was would be resolved by evening. I log back in and start a game to find that I got the 5 minute penalty for leaving a game which I found annoying seeing as how I didn't just decide to leave it was due to technical issues, but whatever, a 5 minute wait no big deal.

My issue now is that this was a solid couple weeks ago and whenever I finish a game now I keep getting a message saying that because I left the game or went afk I am being placed in a lower priority queue.

I try to go to support to ask them about it and have been greeted with this for the past 15 minutes. [img]http://i.imgur.com/VOIrcRz.jpg[/img]

replies.body: That's so weird!  It sounds like your network could be degrading and blocked from accessing specific services.  If you can't submit a ticket through that ticketing center it's okay!  Send us an email to support@riotgames.com.  In the meantime, I highly suggest going over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune things up.
